name: BlobStacker
description:
This game was made in April 2013 for the Dublin 1GAM group

  • Combine 4 similar blocks to make bigger blocks
  • Build the target 3-eyed MEGA blocks
  • Fed blocks to the 'clock' to buy more time

Controls:
Z/Left: Move Left
X/Right: Move Right
Space/Up: JUMP
C/Down: Pick-up/Drop

Holding different types of blocks effects how your character jumps.

  • Red: Normal, no change.
  • Blue: High Jump
  • Yellow: Double-jump
  • Green: Heavy, smaller jumps
  • Purple: Floaty
  • Cyan: Bouncy
